+2: Du kannst eine Kreatur opfern. Falls du dies tust, durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Kreaturenkarte mit Manabetrag gleich 1 plus dem Manabetrag der geopferten Kreatur, bringe sie ins Spiel und mische danach.
+1: Du millst fünf Karten. Nimm dann eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturenkarten, die auf diese Weise gemillt wurden, auf deine Hand.
−1: Erzeuge einen 4/4 grünen Nashorn-Krieger-Kreaturenspielstein.

foreignData.name: Vivien a la caza
foreignData.text:
+2: Puedes sacrificar una criatura. Si lo haces, busca en tu biblioteca una carta de criatura con valor de maná igual a 1 más el valor de maná de la criatura sacrificada, ponla en el campo de batalla y luego baraja.
+1: Muele cinco cartas, luego pon cualquier cantidad de cartas de criatura molidas de esta manera en tu mano.
−1: Crea una ficha de criatura Guerrero Rinoceronte verde 4/4.

foreignData.name: Vivien en chasse
foreignData.text:
+2: Vous pouvez sacrifier une créature. Si vous faites ainsi, cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de créature avec une valeur de mana égale à 1 plus la valeur de mana de la créature sacrifiée, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille, puis mélangez.
+1: Meulez cinq cartes, puis mettez n'importe quel nombre de cartes de créature meulées de cette manière dans votre main.
-1: Créez un jeton de créature 4/4 verte Rhinocéros et Guerrier.

foreignData.name: Vivien a Caccia
foreignData.text:
+2: Puoi sacrificare una creatura. Se lo fai, passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta creatura con valore di mana pari a 1 più il valore di mana della creatura sacrificata, mettila sul campo di battaglia, poi rimescola.
+1: Macina cinque carte, poi aggiungi alla tua mano un qualsiasi numero di carte creatura macinate in questo modo.
−1: Crea una pedina creatura Guerriero Rinoceronte 4/4 verde.

foreignData.name: 狩りに出るビビアン
foreignData.text:
+2：あなたはクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げてもよい。そうしたなら、あなたのライブラリーから、そのクリーチャーよりマナ総量が１大きいクリーチャー・カード１枚を探し、戦場に出し、その後ライブラリーを切り直す。
+1：カード５枚を切削し、その後これにより切削した望む枚数のクリーチャー・カードをあなたの手札に加える。
−1：緑の４/４のサイ・戦士・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
foreignData.type: 伝説のプレインズウォーカー — ビビアン

foreignData.name: 사냥 중인 비비안
foreignData.text:
+2: 당신은 생물 한 개를 희생할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 당신의 서고에서 마나 값이 희생한 생물의 마나 값에 1을 더한 것과 같은 생물 카드 한 장을 찾아, 전장에 놓은 후, 서고를 섞는다.
+1: 카드 다섯 장을 민 후, 이런 식으로 밀린 생물 카드들을 원하는 수만큼 당신의 손에 넣는다.
−1: 4/4 녹색 코뿔소 전사 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.name: Vivien à Caça
foreignData.text:
+2: Você pode sacrificar uma criatura. Se fizer isso, procure em seu grimório um card de criatura com valor de mana igual a 1 mais o valor de mana da criatura sacrificada, coloque-o no campo de batalha e depois embaralhe.
+1: Triture cinco cards e depois coloque qualquer número de cards de criatura triturados dessa forma em sua mão.
−1: Crie uma ficha de criatura Rinoceronte Guerreiro verde 4/4.

foreignData.name: Вивьен, Вышедшая на Охоту
foreignData.text:
+2: вы можете пожертвовать существо. Если вы это делаете, найдите в вашей библиотеке карту существа с мановой ценностью, равной 1 плюс мановая ценность пожертвованного существа, положите ее на поле битвы, затем перетасуйте библиотеку.
+1: скрутите пять карт, затем положите любое количество скрученных таким образом карт существ в вашу руку.
−1: создайте одну фишку существа 4/4 зеленый Носорог Воин.

foreignData.name: 寻猎薇薇安
foreignData.text:
+2：你可以牺牲一个生物。若你如此作，则从你牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，且其法术力值须等同于所牺牲之生物的法术力值加1，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。
+1：磨五张牌，然后将任意数量以此法磨掉的生物牌置于你手上。
−1：派出一个4/4绿色犀牛／战士衍生生物。

foreignData.name: 尋獵薇薇安
foreignData.text:
+2：你可以犧牲一個生物。若你如此作，則從你牌庫中搜尋一張生物牌，且其魔法力值須等同於所犧牲之生物的魔法力值加1，將之放進戰場，然後洗牌。
+1：磨五張牌，然後將任意數量以此法磨掉的生物牌置於你手上。
−1：派出一個4/4綠色犀牛／戰士衍生生物。

cards.name: Vivien on the Hunt
cards.originalText:
+2: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
+1: Mill five cards, then put any number of creature cards milled this way into your hand.
−1: Create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token.

rulings.text: You may activate Vivien on the Hunt's first ability without sacrificing a creature. If you do, the ability does nothing.

cards.text:
[+2]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
[+1]: Mill five cards, then put any number of creature cards milled this way into your hand.
[−1]: Create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token.

foreignData.name: Stimme des Ungeziefers
foreignData.text:
Die Stimme des Ungeziefers kommt mit einer Schildmarke ins Spiel. (Falls ihr Schaden zugefügt oder sie zerstört würde, entferne stattdessen eine Schildmarke von ihr.)
Immer wenn die Stimme des Ungeziefers angreift, hat eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, Basis-Stärke und -Widerstandskraft 4/4 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Voz de las alimañas
foreignData.text:
La Voz de las alimañas entra al campo de batalla con un contador de escudo sobre ella. (Si fuera a recibir daño o a ser destruida, en vez de eso, remueve un contador de escudo de ella.)
Siempre que la Voz de las alimañas ataque, la criatura objetivo que controlas tiene una fuerza y resistencia base de 4/4 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.name: Voix de la vermine
foreignData.text:
La Voix de la vermine arrive sur le champ de bataille avec un marqueur « bouclier » sur elle. (Si elle devait subir des blessures ou être détruite, retirez-lui un marqueur « bouclier » à la place.)
À chaque fois que la Voix de la vermine attaque, une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez a une force et une endurance de base de 4/4 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.name: Voce dei Parassiti
foreignData.text:
La Voce dei Parassiti entra nel campo di battaglia con un segnalino scudo. (Se sta per subire danno o sta per essere distrutta, rimuovi invece un segnalino scudo da essa.)
Ogniqualvolta la Voce dei Parassiti attacca, una creatura bersaglio che controlli ha forza e costituzione base 4/4 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.name: 害獣の声
foreignData.text:
害獣の声は盾カウンター１個が置かれた状態で戦場に出る。（これがダメージを受けるか破壊されるなら、代わりにこれの上から盾カウンター１個を取り除く。）
害獣の声が攻撃するたび、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは基本のパワーとタフネスが４/４である。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・市民

foreignData.name: 해충들의 목소리
foreignData.text:
해충들의 목소리는 방패 카운터 한 개를 가지고 전장에 들어온다. (이 생물이 피해를 입거나 파괴되려 한다면, 대신 이 생물에서 방패 카운터 한 개를 제거한다.)
해충들의 목소리가 공격할 때마다, 당신이 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 기본 공격력 및 방어력이 4/4가 된다.

foreignData.name: Voz das Pragas
foreignData.text:
Voz das Pragas entra no campo de batalha com um marcador de escudo. (Se ela sofreria dano ou seria destruída, em vez disso, remova um marcador de escudo dela.)
Toda vez que Voz das Pragas ataca, a criatura alvo que você controla tem poder e resistência básicos 4/4 até o final do turno.

foreignData.name: Голос Паразитов
foreignData.text:
Голос Паразитов выходит на поле битвы с одним жетоном щита на нем. (Если он должен получить повреждения или быть уничтожен, вместо этого удалите с него один жетон щита.)
Каждый раз, когда Голос Паразитов атакует, целевое существо под вашим контролем имеет базовую силу и выносливость 4/4 до конца хода.

foreignData.name: 兽性传声人
foreignData.text:
兽性传声人进战场时上面有一个后盾指示物。（如果它将受到伤害或将被消灭，则改为从其上移去一个后盾指示物。）
每当兽性传声人攻击时，目标由你操控的生物之基础力量与防御力为4/4直到回合结束。

foreignData.name: 獸性傳聲人
foreignData.text:
獸性傳聲人進戰場時上面有一個後盾指示物。（如果它將受到傷害或將被消滅，則改為從其上移去一個後盾指示物。）
每當獸性傳聲人攻擊時，目標由你操控的生物之基礎力量與防禦力為4/4直到回合結束。

cards.name: Voice of the Vermin
cards.originalText:
Voice of the Vermin enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
Whenever Voice of the Vermin attacks, target creature you control has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Shield counters don't prevent players from sacrificing creatures.
Removing a shield counter in this way isn't the same as regenerating a creature.
If a permanent that would be dealt damage has more than one shield counter on it, that damage is prevented and only one shield counter is removed.
If a permanent with a shield counter is dealt unpreventable damage, that damage will be dealt and a shield counter will still be removed.

A creature with a shield counter on it may still be destroyed by state-based actions if it has damage marked on it equal to its toughness or has been dealt unpreventable damage by a source with deathtouch.

“Shield” is not an ability that creatures have and shield counters are not keyword counters. If a creature with a shield counter loses its abilities, the shield counter will still protect it as normal.

cards.text:
Voice of the Vermin enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
Whenever Voice of the Vermin attacks, target creature you control has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn.

cards.flavorText: "Welcome to the family. Chef Rocco sends their congratulations."

foreignData.flavorText: „Willkommen in der Familie. Koch Rocco sendet Glückwünsche."
foreignData.name: Herzlicher Empfang
foreignData.text: Schaue dir die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst davon eine Kreaturenkarte offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek. Erzeuge einen 1/1 grünen und weißen Bürger-Kreaturenspielstein.

foreignData.flavorText: "Te damos la bienvenida a la familia. Chef Rocco te manda sus saludos".

foreignData.text: Mira las cinco primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta de criatura de entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en un orden aleatorio. Crea una ficha de criatura Ciudadano verde y blanca 1/1.

foreignData.flavorText: « Bienvenue dans la famille. Le chef Rocco vous adresse ses félicitations. »

foreignData.flavorText: 「一家へようこそ。シェフのロッコからのお祝いです。」

foreignData.flavorText: "패밀리에 들어온 것을 환영하네. 주방장 로코가 축하 인사를 보내왔지."
foreignData.name: 따뜻한 환영

foreignData.flavorText: "Bem-vindo à família. Com os cumprimentos do chef Rocco."

foreignData.text: Olhe os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode revelar um card de criatura dentre eles e colocá-lo em sua mão. Coloque o restante no fundo de seu grimório em ordem aleatória. Crie uma ficha de criatura Cidadão verde e branca 1/1.

foreignData.flavorText: «Добро пожаловать в семью. Шеф-повар Рокко передает свои поздравления».

foreignData.flavorText: 「歡迎加入家族。請享用主廚羅孔招待的小小心意。」
foreignData.name: 竭誠歡迎
foreignData.text: 檢視你牌庫頂的五張牌。你可以展示其中的一張生物牌，並將它置於你手上。將其餘的牌以隨機順序置於你的牌庫底。派出一個1/1，綠白雙色的市民衍生生物。

cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.

cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Create two 1/1 green and white Citizen creature tokens.

foreignData.name: Werkstatt-Kriegshäuptling
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Wenn der Werkstatt-Kriegshäuptling ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.
Wenn der Werkstatt-Kriegshäuptling stirbt, erzeuge einen 4/4 grünen Nashorn-Krieger-Kreaturenspielstein.
Blitz {4}{G}{G} (Falls du diesen Zauberspruch für seine Blitz-Kosten wirkst, erhält er Eile und „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, ziehe eine Karte." Opfere diese Kreatur zu Beginn des nächsten Endsegments.)

foreignData.name: Jefe de guerra del taller

Arrolla.
Cuando el Jefe de guerra del taller entre al campo de batalla, ganas 3 vidas.

Piétinement

cards.originalText:
Trample
When Workshop Warchief enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
When Workshop Warchief dies, create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token.
Blitz {4}{G}{G} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

rulings.text: If you choose to pay the blitz cost rather than the mana cost, you're still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its blitz cost only if you could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the blitz cost to cast a creature spell, that permanent will be sacrificed only if it's still on the battlefield when that triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don't have to attack with the creature with blitz unless another ability says you do.

If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose blitz cost was paid, the copy won't have haste, won't be sacrificed, and its controller won't draw a card when it dies.
The triggered ability that lets its controller draw a card triggers when it dies for any reason, not just when you sacrifice it during the end step.

cards.name: Aven Heartstabber
cards.originalText:
Flying
As long as there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, Aven Heartstabber gets +2/+2 and has deathtouch.
When Aven Heartstabber dies, mill two cards, then draw a card.

rulings.text: If you have five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard and then some of them are removed such that you have fewer than five mana values among those cards, Aven Heartstabber loses its bonus to power and toughness. Notably, this may cause it to die if it now has damage marked on it greater than its toughness.
“Five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard” means there are at least five different mana values among those cards.
The mana value of a split card in the graveyard is the total mana value of both halves of that card. It does not have two mana values.
The mana value of a double-faced card in your graveyard is always the mana value of the front face.
X is 0 when determining the mana value of a card in your graveyard.
The mana value of a land card is 0.

cards.name: Disciplined Duelist
cards.originalText:
Double strike
Disciplined Duelist enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

rulings.text: Shield counters don't prevent players from sacrificing creatures.
Removing a shield counter in this way isn't the same as regenerating a creature.
If a permanent that would be dealt damage has more than one shield counter on it, that damage is prevented and only one shield counter is removed.
If a permanent with a shield counter is dealt unpreventable damage, that damage will be dealt and a shield counter will still be removed.

A creature with a shield counter on it may still be destroyed by state-based actions if it has damage marked on it equal to its toughness or has been dealt unpreventable damage by a source with deathtouch.

“Shield” is not an ability that creatures have and shield counters are not keyword counters. If a creature with a shield counter loses its abilities, the shield counter will still protect it as normal.

cards.name: Falco Spara, Pactweaver
cards.originalText:
Flying, trample
Falco Spara, Pactweaver enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it.
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast spells from the top of your library by removing a counter from a creature you control in addition to paying their other costs.

rulings.text: Removing a counter from a creature is an additional cost of casting the spell and may be combined with other additional costs or alternative costs that spell may have, such as casualty.

If you cast a spell with casualty this way, you can pay the costs in any order, which means that you may remove a counter from a creature then sacrifice it to pay the casualty cost. Bear in mind that removing a +1/+1 counter this way will reduce a creature's power, which might prevent you from paying the casualty cost with that creature.
Shield counters don't prevent players from sacrificing creatures.
Removing a shield counter in this way isn't the same as regenerating a creature.
If a permanent that would be dealt damage has more than one shield counter on it, that damage is prevented and only one shield counter is removed.
If a permanent with a shield counter is dealt unpreventable damage, that damage will be dealt and a shield counter will still be removed.

A creature with a shield counter on it may still be destroyed by state-based actions if it has damage marked on it equal to its toughness or has been dealt unpreventable damage by a source with deathtouch.

“Shield” is not an ability that creatures have and shield counters are not keyword counters. If a creature with a shield counter loses its abilities, the shield counter will still protect it as normal.

cards.name: Jetmir, Nexus of Revels
cards.originalText:
Creatures you control get +1/+0 and have vigilance as long as you control three or more creatures.
Creatures you control also get +1/+0 and have trample as long as you control six or more creatures.
Creatures you control also get +1/+0 and have double strike as long as you control nine or more creatures.

rulings.text: If a creature with double strike loses double strike after dealing damage during the first combat damage step but before dealing damage in the second combat damage step, it will not deal damage during that second combat damage step. Notably, this means that if your ninth creature dies in the first combat damage step, the rest of your creatures won't deal combat damage again unless something else is granting them double strike.

Когда Лорд Зандер, Коллекционер выходит на поле битвы, целевой оппонент сбрасывает половину карт из своей руки с округлением в меньшую сторону.
Каждый раз, когда Лорд Зандер атакует, защищающийся игрок скручивает половину своей библиотеки с округлением в меньшую сторону.
Когда Лорд Зандер умирает, целевой оппонент жертвует половину не являющихся землями перманентов под своим контролем с округлением в меньшую сторону.

foreignData.name: 收集魔尚夺尔勋爵
foreignData.text:
当收集魔尚夺尔勋爵进战场时，目标对手弃一半数量的手牌，小数点后舍去。
每当尚夺尔勋爵攻击时，防御牌手磨其牌库一半数量的牌，小数点后舍去。
当尚夺尔勋爵死去时，目标对手牺牲一半数量由其操控的非地永久物，小数点后舍去。
foreignData.type: 传奇生物 ～吸血鬼／恶魔／贵族

foreignData.name: 收集魔尚奪爾勳爵
foreignData.text:
當收集魔尚奪爾勳爵進戰場時，目標對手棄一半數量的手牌，小數點後捨去。
每當尚奪爾勳爵攻擊時，防禦玩家磨其牌庫一半數量的牌，小數點後捨去。
當尚奪爾勳爵死去時，目標對手犧牲一半數量由其操控的非地永久物，小數點後捨去。
foreignData.type: 傳奇生物 ～吸血鬼／惡魔／貴族

cards.name: Lord Xander, the Collector
cards.originalText:
When Lord Xander, the Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent discards half the cards in their hand, rounded down.
Whenever Lord Xander attacks, defending player mills half their library, rounded down.
When Lord Xander dies, target opponent sacrifices half the nonland permanents they control, rounded down.
cards.text:
When Lord Xander, the Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent discards half the cards in their hand, rounded down.
Whenever Lord Xander attacks, defending player mills half their library, rounded down.
When Lord Xander dies, target opponent sacrifices half the nonland permanents they control, rounded down.

foreignData.name: Aufstieg der Maestros
foreignData.text: Einmal während jedes deiner Züge kannst du einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei aus deinem Friedhof wirken, indem du zusätzlich zu seinen bzw. ihren anderen Kosten eine Kreatur opferst. Falls ein Zauberspruch, der auf diese Weise gewirkt wurde, auf deinen Friedhof gelegt würde, schicke ihn stattdessen ins Exil.

foreignData.name: Supremacía de los Maestros
foreignData.text: Una vez durante cada uno de tus turnos, puedes lanzar un hechizo de instantáneo o de conjuro desde tu cementerio sacrificando una criatura además de pagar sus otros costes. Si un hechizo lanzado de esta manera fuera a ir a tu cementerio, en vez de eso, exílialo.

foreignData.name: Ascendance des Maestros
foreignData.text: Une fois pendant chacun de vos tours, vous pouvez lancer un sort d'éphémère ou de rituel depuis votre cimetière en sacrifiant une créature en plus de payer ses autres coûts. Si un sort lancé de cette manière devait être mis dans votre cimetière, exilez-le à la place.

foreignData.name: Influenza dei Maestro
foreignData.text: Una volta durante ogni tuo turno, puoi lanciare una magia istantaneo o stregoneria dal tuo cimitero sacrificando una creatura oltre a pagare i suoi altri costi. Se una magia lanciata in questo modo sta per essere messa nel tuo cimitero, invece esiliala.

foreignData.name: 貴顕廊一家の隆盛
foreignData.text: あなたの各ターン中に１回、他のコストの支払いに加えてクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げることで、あなたはあなたの墓地にありインスタントやソーサリーである呪文１つを唱えてもよい。これにより唱えられた呪文があなたの墓地に置かれるなら、代わりにそれを追放する。

foreignData.name: 마에스트로스의 지배력
foreignData.text: 당신의 매 턴마다 한 번, 당신은 주문의 다른 비용을 지불하는 것에 더해 생물 한 개를 희생하는 것으로 당신의 무덤에서 순간마법 또는 집중마법 주문을 발동할 수 있다. 이런 식으로 발동한 주문이 무덤에 들어가려고 하면, 대신 그 카드를 추방한다.

foreignData.name: Domínio dos Maestros
foreignData.text: Uma vez durante cada um de seus turnos, você pode conjurar uma mágica instantânea ou um feitiço de seu cemitério sacrificando uma criatura além de pagar seus outros custos. Se uma mágica conjurada desta forma seria colocada em seu cemitério, em vez disso, exile-a.

foreignData.name: Возвышение Маэстро
foreignData.text: Один раз во время каждого из ваших ходов вы можете разыграть мгновенное заклинание или заклинание волшебства из вашего кладбища, пожертвовав существо в дополнение к оплате остальных его стоимостей. Если разыгранное таким образом заклинание должно быть положено на ваше кладбище, изгоните его вместо этого.

foreignData.name: 绝艺盟霸权
foreignData.text: 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以从你的坟墓场中施放一个瞬间或法术咒语，但在其他费用以外，还须牺牲一个生物。如果以此法施放的咒语将进入你的坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。

foreignData.name: 絕藝盟霸權
foreignData.text: 僅於你的每個回合中且限一次，你可以從你的墳墓場中施放一個瞬間或巫術咒語，但在其他費用以外，還須犧牲一個生物。如果以此法施放的咒語將進入你的墳墓場，則改為將它放逐。

cards.name: Maestros Ascendancy
cards.originalText: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature in addition to paying its other costs. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

rulings.text: If you cast an Adventure spell from your graveyard this way, it's exiled as it resolves with the replacement effect created by the Adventure rules and you may cast the creature card from exile later.

cards.text: Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard by sacrificing a creature in addition to paying its other costs. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

foreignData.name: Maestros-Amulett
foreignData.text:
Bestimme eines —
• Schaue dir die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine davon auf deine Hand und lege den Rest auf deinen Friedhof.
• Jeder Gegner verliert 3 Lebenspunkte und du erhältst 3 Lebenspunkte dazu.
• Das Maestros-Amulett fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Planeswalker deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.name: Amuleto de los Maestros
foreignData.text:
Elige uno:
• Mira las cinco primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de esas cartas en tu mano y el resto en tu cementerio.
• Cada oponente pierde 3 vidas y tú ganas 3 vidas.
• El Amuleto de los Maestros hace 5 puntos de daño a la criatura o planeswalker objetivo.

foreignData.name: Charme des Maestros
foreignData.text:
Choisissez l'un —
• Regardez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une de ces cartes dans votre main et le reste dans votre cimetière.
• Chaque adversaire perd 3 points de vie et vous gagnez 3 points de vie.
• Le Charme des Maestros inflige 5 blessures à une cible, créature ou planeswalker.

foreignData.name: Talismano dei Maestro
foreignData.text:
Scegli uno —
• Guarda le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungi una di quelle carte alla tua mano e metti le altre nel tuo cimitero.
• Ogni avversario perde 3 punti vita e tu guadagni 3 punti vita.
• Il Talismano dei Maestro infligge 5 danni a una creatura o a un planeswalker bersaglio.

foreignData.name: 貴顕廊一家の魔除け
foreignData.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
• あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード５枚を見る。それらのカードのうち１枚をあなたの手札に、残りをあなたの墓地に置く。
• 各対戦相手はそれぞれ３点のライフを失い、あなたは３点のライフを得る。
• クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーのうち１体を対象とする。貴顕廊一家の魔除けはそれに５点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.name: 마에스트로스 부적
foreignData.text:
하나를 선택한다 —
• 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 다섯 장을 본다. 그 카드들 중 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져가고 나머지는 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
• 각 상대는 생명 3점을 잃고 당신은 생명 3점을 얻는다.
• 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 마에스트로스 부적은 그 목표에게 피해 5점을 입힌다.

foreignData.name: Amuleto dos Maestros
foreignData.text:
Escolha um —
• Olhe os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque um deles em sua mão e o restante em seu cemitério.
• Cada oponente perde 3 pontos de vida e você ganha 3 pontos de vida.
• Amuleto dos Maestros causa 5 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao planeswalker alvo.

foreignData.name: Талисман Маэстро
foreignData.text:
Выберите одно —
• Посмотрите пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Положите одну из тех карт в вашу руку, а остальные — на ваше кладбище.
• Каждый оппонент теряет 3 жизни, а вы получаете 3 жизни.
• Талисман Маэстро наносит 5 повреждений целевому существу или planeswalker'у.

foreignData.name: 绝艺盟护符
foreignData.text:
选择一项～
•检视你牌库顶的五张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则置入你的坟墓场。
•每位对手各失去3点生命且你获得3点生命。
•绝艺盟护符对目标生物或鹏洛客造成5点伤害。

foreignData.name: 絕藝盟護符
foreignData.text:
選擇一項～
•檢視你牌庫頂的五張牌。將其中一張置於你手上，其餘的牌則置入你的墳墓場。
•每位對手各失去3點生命且你獲得3點生命。
•絕藝盟護符對目標生物或鵬洛客造成5點傷害。

cards.name: Maestros Charm
cards.originalText:
Choose one —
• Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
• Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
• Maestros Charm deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
• Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

cards.flavorText: "Where did I find my horned friend? Now there's a story worth telling. . . ."

foreignData.flavorText: „Wo ich meinen gehörnten Freund gefunden habe? Eine abenteuerliche Geschichte …"
foreignData.name: Maestros-Diaboliker
foreignData.text:
Todesberührung, Eile
Immer wenn der Maestros-Diaboliker angreift und falls du keinen Teufel-Spielstein kontrollierst, erzeuge einen getappten und angreifenden 1/1 roten Teufel-Kreaturenspielstein mit „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, fügt sie einem Ziel deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu."

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Que dónde me encontré a mi amigo con cuernos? Pues es una gran historia...".
foreignData.name: Diabolista de los Maestros
foreignData.text:
Toque mortal, prisa.
Siempre que el Diabolista de los Maestros ataque, si no controlas una ficha de Diablo, crea una ficha de criatura Diablo roja 1/1 girada y atacando con "Cuando esta criatura muera, hace 1 punto de daño a cualquier objetivo".

foreignData.flavorText: « Où j'ai trouvé mon compagnon à cornes ? Ça c'est une histoire qui vaut le détour... »
foreignData.name: Diaboliste des Maestros
foreignData.text:
Contact mortel, célérité
À chaque fois que le Diaboliste des Maestros attaque, si vous ne contrôlez pas de jeton Diable, créez, engagé et attaquant, un jeton de créature 1/1 rouge Diable avec « Quand cette créature meurt, elle inflige 1 blessure à n'importe quelle cible. »

foreignData.flavorText: "Dove ho trovato il mio amichetto dotato di corna? Beh, ecco una storia che vale la pena raccontare..."
foreignData.name: Diabolico dei Maestro
foreignData.text:
Tocco letale, rapidità
Ogniqualvolta il Diabolico dei Maestro attacca, se non controlli una pedina Diavolo, crea una pedina creatura Diavolo 1/1 rossa TAPpata e attaccante con "Quando questa creatura muore, infligge 1 danno a un qualsiasi bersaglio".

foreignData.flavorText: 「角持ちの友人をどこで見つけたかって？これには語るに足る物語がありまして……」
foreignData.name: 貴顕廊一家の悪魔信者
foreignData.text:
接死、速攻
貴顕廊一家の悪魔信者が攻撃するたび、あなたがデビル・トークンをコントロールしていない場合、「このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーやプレイヤーのうち１つを対象とする。これはそれに１点のダメージを与える。」を持つ、赤の１/１のデビル・クリーチャー・トークン１体をタップ状態かつ攻撃している状態で生成する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: "어디서 내 뿔 달린 친구를 찾았냐고? 거기엔 기막힌 이야기가 있지. . . ."
foreignData.name: 마에스트로스 악마주의자
foreignData.text:
치명타, 신속
마에스트로스 악마주의자가 공격할 때마다, 당신이 악령 토큰을 조종하지 않는다면, "이 생물이 죽을 때, 원하는 목표를 정한다. 이 생물은 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입힌다."를 가졌으며 탭되어 공격 중인 1/1 적색 악령 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Onde eu achei o meu amiguinho chifrudo? Olha, essa história é boa, hein..."
foreignData.name: Diabolista dos Maestros
foreignData.text:
Toque mortífero, ímpeto
Toda vez que Diabolista dos Maestros atacar, se você não controlar uma ficha de Diabo, crie uma ficha de criatura Diabo vermelha 1/1 virada e atacando com "Quando esta criatura morre, ela causa 1 ponto de dano a qualquer alvo".

foreignData.flavorText: «Где я нашел своего рогатого друга? О, эта история достойна рассказа...»
foreignData.name: Дьяволист Маэстро
foreignData.text:
Смертельное касание, Ускорение
Каждый раз, когда Дьяволист Маэстро атакует, если у вас под контролем нет фишки Дьявола, создайте одну повернутую и атакующую фишку существа 1/1 красный Дьявол со способностью «Когда это существо умирает, оно наносит 1 повреждение любой цели».

foreignData.flavorText: 「我是在哪里找到这位长角朋友？这故事我可得好好讲一讲…」
foreignData.name: 绝艺盟崇魔者
foreignData.text:
死触，敏捷
每当绝艺盟崇魔者攻击时，若你未操控魔鬼衍生生物，则派出一个1/1红色魔鬼衍生生物，其为已横置且正进行攻击，并具有「当此生物死去时，它对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。」

foreignData.flavorText: 「我是在哪裡找到這位長角朋友？這故事我可得好好講一講…」
foreignData.name: 絕藝盟崇魔者
foreignData.text:
死觸，敏捷
每當絕藝盟崇魔者攻擊時，若你未操控魔鬼衍生生物，則派出一個1/1紅色魔鬼衍生生物，其為已橫置且正進行攻擊，並具有「當此生物死去時，它對任意一個目標造成1點傷害。」

cards.name: Maestros Diabolist
cards.originalText:
Deathtouch, haste
Whenever Maestros Diabolist attacks, if you don't control a Devil token, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

rulings.text: Maestros Diabolist's triggered ability has an “intervening ‘if'” clause. This means that it checks to see if you control a Devil token both when the ability triggers and when it resolves. Notably, this means that attacking with two Maestros Diabolists will normally cause you to create only one Devil token.

cards.text:
Deathtouch, haste
Whenever Maestros Diabolist attacks, if you don't control a Devil token, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

foreignData.name: Maskierte Banditen
foreignData.text:
Wachsamkeit
Bedrohlich (Diese Kreatur kann nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen.)
{2}, schicke die Maskierten Banditen aus deiner Hand ins Exil: Ein Land deiner Wahl erhält „{T}: Erzeuge {B}, {R} oder {G}", bis die Maskierten Banditen aus dem Exil gewirkt werden. Solange die Maskierten Banditen im Exil bleiben, kannst du sie wirken.

foreignData.name: Bandidos enmascarados
foreignData.text:
Vigilancia.
Amenaza. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por dos o más criaturas.)
{2}, exiliar los Bandidos enmascarados de tu mano: La tierra objetivo gana "{T}: Agrega {B}, {R} o {G}" hasta que los Bandidos enmascarados se lancen desde el exilio. Puedes lanzar los Bandidos enmascarados mientras permanezcan exiliados.

foreignData.name: Bandits masqués
foreignData.text:
Vigilance
Menace (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par deux créatures ou plus.)
{2}, exilez les Bandits masqués de votre main : Un terrain ciblé acquiert « {T} : Ajoutez {B}, {R}, ou {G} » jusqu'à ce que les Bandits masqués soient lancés depuis l'exil. Vous pouvez lancer les Bandits masqués tant qu'ils restent exilés.

foreignData.name: Banditi Mascherati
foreignData.text:
Cautela
Minacciare (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da due o più creature.)
{2}, Esilia i Banditi Mascherati dalla tua mano: Una terra bersaglio ha "{T}: Aggiungi {B}, {R} o {G}" finché i Banditi Mascherati non vengono lanciati dall'esilio. Puoi lanciare i Banditi Mascherati fintanto che rimangono esiliati.

foreignData.name: 覆面の匪賊
foreignData.text:
警戒
威迫（このクリーチャーは２体以上のクリーチャーにしかブロックされない。）
{2}, あなたの手札にある覆面の匪賊を追放する：土地１つを対象とする。覆面の匪賊が追放領域から唱えられるまで、それは「{T}：{B}か{R}か{G}を加える。」を得る。覆面の匪賊が追放され続けているかぎり、あなたはこれを唱えてもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — アライグマ・ならず者

foreignData.name: 복면을 쓴 도적단
foreignData.text:
경계
호전적 (이 생물은 두 개 이상의 생물에만 방어될 수 있다.)
{2}, 당신의 손에서 복면을 쓴 도적단을 추방한다: 대지를 목표로 정한다. 그 대지는 복면을 쓴 도적단이 추방 영역에서 발동될 때까지 "{T}: {B}, {R}, 또는 {G}를 추가한다."를 얻는다. 복면을 쓴 도적단이 추방되어 있는 한 당신은 복면을 쓴 도적단을 발동할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Bandidos Mascarados
foreignData.text:
Vigilância
Ameaçar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por duas ou mais criaturas.)
{2}, exile Bandidos Mascarados de sua mão: O terreno alvo ganha "{T}: Adicione {B}, {R} ou {G}" até que Bandidos Mascarados seja conjurado do exílio. Você poderá conjurar Bandidos Mascarados enquanto ele permanecer exilado.

foreignData.name: Бандиты в Масках
foreignData.text:
Бдительность
Угроза (Это существо не может быть заблокировано менее чем двумя существами.)
{2}, изгоните Бандитов в Масках из вашей руки: целевая земля получает способность «{T}: добавьте {B}, {R} или {G}» до тех пор, пока Бандиты в Масках не будут разыграны из изгнания. Вы можете разыграть Бандитов в Масках, пока они остаются в изгнании.

foreignData.name: 蒙面盗匪
foreignData.text:
警戒
威慑（此生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）
{2}，从你手上放逐蒙面盗匪：直到从放逐区施放蒙面盗匪为止，目标地获得「{T}：加{B}，{R}或{G}。」于蒙面盗匪持续放逐的时段内，你可以施放它。

foreignData.name: 蒙面盜匪
foreignData.text:

cards.name: Ob Nixilis, the Adversary
cards.originalText:
Casualty X. The copy isn't legendary and has starting loyalty X. (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power X. When you do, copy this spell. The copy becomes a token.)
+1: Each opponent loses 2 life unless they discard a card. If you control a Demon or Devil, you gain 2 life.
−2: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
−7: Target player draws seven cards and loses 7 life.

rulings.text: As you cast a spell with casualty X, you choose whether to pay its casualty cost and what the value of X will be.

The copied spell from Ob Nixilis, the Adversary's triggered ability copies exactly what is printed on Ob Nixilis, except its starting loyalty is equal to the chosen value of X and it isn't legendary. The copy becomes a token as it resolves.
You can control exactly one legendary Ob Nixilis, the Adversary and any number of nonlegendary copies of Ob Nixilis, the Adversary.

Casualty N means “As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power N or greater.” and “When you cast this spell, if a casualty cost was paid for it, copy it. If the spell has any targets, you may choose new targets for the copy.”
You may sacrifice only one creature to pay a spell's casualty cost, and you copy the spell only once.
If you pay the casualty cost of a spell, the copy will resolve before the original spell.
The copy of the spell is created on the stack, so it's not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won't trigger.

cards.text:

foreignData.name: Aufstieg der Obscura
foreignData.text:
Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch wirkst und falls sein Manabetrag gleich 1 plus der Anzahl an Seelenmarken auf dem Aufstieg der Obscura ist, lege eine Seelenmarke auf den Aufstieg der Obscura und erzeuge dann einen 2/2 weißen Geist-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.
Solange fünf oder mehr Seelenmarken auf dem Aufstieg der Obscura liegen, erhalten Geister, die du kontrollierst, +3/+3.

foreignData.name: Supremacía de la Obscura
foreignData.text:
Siempre que lances un hechizo, si su valor de maná es igual a 1 más la cantidad de contadores de alma sobre la Supremacía de la Obscura, pon un contador de alma sobre la Supremacía de la Obscura y luego crea una ficha de criatura Espíritu blanca 2/2 con la habilidad de volar.
Mientras haya cinco o más contadores de alma sobre la Supremacía de la Obscura, los Espíritus que controlas obtienen +3/+3.

foreignData.name: Ascendance des Obscura
foreignData.text:
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort, si sa valeur de mana est égale à 1 plus le nombre de marqueurs « âme » sur l'Ascendance des Obscura, mettez un marqueur « âme » sur l'Ascendance des Obscura, puis créez un jeton de créature 2/2 blanche Esprit avec le vol.
Tant qu'il y a au moins cinq marqueurs « âme » sur l'Ascendance des Obscura, les esprits que vous contrôlez gagnent +3/+3.

foreignData.name: Influenza degli Obscura

Fintanto che ci sono cinque o più segnalini anima sull'Influenza degli Obscura, gli Spiriti che controlli prendono +3/+3.

foreignData.name: 常夜会一家の隆盛
foreignData.text:
あなたが呪文を唱えるたび、それのマナ総量が常夜会一家の隆盛の上にある魂魄カウンターの個数に１を足した数に等しい場合、常夜会一家の隆盛の上に魂魄カウンター１個を置く。その後、飛行を持つ白の２/２のスピリット・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
常夜会一家の隆盛の上に５個以上の魂魄カウンターがあるかぎり、あなたがコントロールしているすべてのスピリットは＋３/＋３の修整を受ける。

foreignData.name: 옵스큐라의 지배력
foreignData.text:

옵스큐라의 지배력에 영혼 카운터가 다섯 개 이상 놓여 있는 한, 당신이 조종하는 신령들은 +3/+3을 받는다.

foreignData.name: Domínio dos Obscura

Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica, se seu valor de mana for igual a 1 mais o número de marcadores de alma em Domínio dos Obscura, coloque um marcador de alma em Domínio dos Obscura e depois crie uma ficha de criatura Espírito branca 2/2 com voar.
Enquanto houver cinco ou mais marcadores de alma em Domínio dos Obscura, os Espíritos que você controla receberão +3/+3.

foreignData.name: Возвышение Обскуры

Пока на Возвышении Обскуры есть пять или больше жетонов души, Духи под вашим контролем получают +3/+3.

foreignData.name: 秘闻帮霸权

只要秘闻帮霸权上有五个或更多灵魂指示物，由你操控的精怪便得+3/+3。

foreignData.name: 秘聞幫霸權

cards.name: Obscura Ascendancy
cards.originalText:
Whenever you cast a spell, if its mana value is equal to 1 plus the number of soul counters on Obscura Ascendancy, put a soul counter on Obscura Ascendancy, then create a 2/2 white Spirit creature token with flying.
As long as there are five or more soul counters on Obscura Ascendancy, Spirits you control get +3/+3.

rulings.text: If there are no soul counters on Obscura Ascendancy, its ability triggers if you cast a spell with mana value 1. If there is one counter, its ability triggers if you cast a spell with mana value 2, and so on.

Obscura Ascendancy's triggered ability has an “intervening ‘if'” clause. This means that it checks the number of counters both when the ability triggers and when it resolves. Notably, this means that casting two instants in a row with mana value 1 will never cause a player to create two tokens or put two counters on Obscura Ascendancy.

cards.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, if its mana value is equal to 1 plus the number of soul counters on Obscura Ascendancy, put a soul counter on Obscura Ascendancy, then create a 2/2 white Spirit creature token with flying.
As long as there are five or more soul counters on Obscura Ascendancy, Spirits you control get +3/+3.

foreignData.name: Interceptora de la Obscura

foreignData.type: クリーチャー — セファリッド・ウィザード

foreignData.name: 옵스큐라 요격자

옵스큐라 요격자가 전장에 들어올 때, 옵스큐라 요격자는 묵인한다. 옵스큐라 요격자가 이런 식으로 묵인할 때, 주문을 최대 한 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다. (생물이 묵인하게 하려면, 카드 한 장을 뽑은 후, 카드 한 장을 버린다. 당신이 대지가 아닌 카드를 버린다면, 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.)

foreignData.name: Interceptadora dos Obscura

foreignData.name: Перехватчица Обскуры

cards.name: Obscura Interceptor
cards.originalText:
Flash
Lifelink
When Obscura Interceptor enters the battlefield, it connives. When it connives this way, return up to one target spell to its owner's hand. (To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

rulings.text: If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to connive but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still connives. Abilities that trigger “when [that creature] connives,” such as that of Obscura Interceptor, will trigger.

{2}, 당신의 손에서 흥청대는 난봉꾼들을 추방한다: 대지를 목표로 정한다. 그 대지는 흥청대는 난봉꾼들이 추방 영역에서 발동될 때까지 "{T}: {R}, {G}, 또는 {W}를 추가한다."를 얻는다. 흥청대는 난봉꾼들이 추방되어 있는 한 당신은 흥청대는 난봉꾼들을 발동할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Farristas Libertinos
foreignData.text:
Quando Farristas Libertinos entrar no campo de batalha, crie uma ficha de criatura Cidadão verde e branca 1/1.
{2}, exile Farristas Libertinos de sua mão: O terreno alvo ganha "{T}: Adicione {R}, {G} ou {W}" até que Farristas Libertinos seja conjurado do exílio. Você poderá conjurar Farristas Libertinos enquanto ele permanecer exilado.

foreignData.name: Лихие Гуляки
foreignData.text:
Когда Лихие Гуляки выходят на поле битвы, создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 зеленый и белый Гражданин.
{2}, изгоните Лихих Гуляк из вашей руки: целевая земля получает способность «{T}: добавьте {R}, {G} или {W}» до тех пор, пока Лихие Гуляки не будут разыграны из изгнания. Вы можете разыграть Лихих Гуляк, пока они остаются в изгнании.

foreignData.name: 放浪欢客
foreignData.text:
当放浪欢客进战场时，派出一个1/1，绿白双色的市民衍生生物。
{2}，从你手上放逐放浪欢客：直到从放逐区施放放浪欢客为止，目标地获得「{T}：加{R}，{G}或{W}。」于放浪欢客持续放逐的时段内，你可以施放它。

foreignData.name: 放浪歡客

當放浪歡客進戰場時，派出一個1/1，綠白雙色的市民衍生生物。
{2}，從你手上放逐放浪歡客：直到從放逐區施放放浪歡客為止，目標地獲得「{T}：加{R}，{G}或{W}。」於放浪歡客持續放逐的時段內，你可以施放它。

cards.name: Rakish Revelers
cards.originalText:
When Rakish Revelers enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
{2}, Exile Rakish Revelers from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}" until Rakish Revelers is cast from exile. You may cast Rakish Revelers for as long as it remains exiled.

rulings.text: You may use the mana ability Rakish Revelers grants to the land while casting Rakish Revelers from exile.
If Rakish Revelers is removed from exile without being cast, the land will continue to have this ability.

cards.text:
When Rakish Revelers enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
{2}, Exile Rakish Revelers from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}" until Rakish Revelers is cast from exile. You may cast Rakish Revelers for as long as it remains exiled.

When Rakish Revelers enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
{1}, Exile Rakish Revelers from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}" until Rakish Revelers is cast from exile. You may cast Rakish Revelers for as long as it remains exiled.

foreignData.name: Rigo, Mentor der Straßen
foreignData.text:
Rigo, Mentor der Straßen, kommt mit einer Schildmarke ins Spiel. (Falls ihm Schaden zugefügt oder er zerstört würde, entferne stattdessen eine Schildmarke von ihm.)
Immer wenn du einen Spieler oder Planeswalker mit einer oder mehreren Kreaturen mit Stärke 1 oder weniger angreifst, ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.name: Rigo, mentor sagaz
foreignData.text:
Rigo, mentor sagaz entra al campo de batalla con un contador de escudo sobre él. (Si fuera a recibir daño o a ser destruido, en vez de eso, remueve un contador de escudo de él.)
Siempre que ataques a un jugador o planeswalker con una o más criaturas con fuerza de 1 o menos, roba una carta.

foreignData.name: Rigo, mentor des rues
foreignData.text:
Rigo, mentor des rues arrive sur le champ de bataille avec un marqueur « bouclier » sur lui. (S'il devait subir des blessures ou être détruit, retirez-lui un marqueur « bouclier » à la place.)
À chaque fois que vous attaquez un joueur ou un planeswalker avec au moins une créature de force inférieure ou égale à 1, piochez une carte.

foreignData.name: Rigo, Mentore della Vita di Strada
foreignData.text:

Ogniqualvolta attacchi un giocatore o un planeswalker con una o più creature con forza pari o inferiore a 1, pesca una carta.

foreignData.name: 路上の師、リガ
foreignData.text:
路上の師、リガは盾カウンター１個が置かれた状態で戦場に出る。（これがダメージを受けるか破壊されるなら、代わりにこれの上から盾カウンターを１個取り除く。）
あなたがパワーが１以下である１体以上のクリーチャーでプレイヤーやプレインズウォーカーのうち１つを攻撃するたび、カード１枚を引く。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 猫・市民

foreignData.name: 길거리 규칙에 밝은 스승, 리고
foreignData.text:
길거리 규칙에 밝은 스승, 리고는 방패 카운터 한 개를 가지고 전장에 들어온다. (이 생물이 피해를 입거나 파괴되려 한다면, 대신 이 생물에서 방패 카운터 한 개를 제거한다.)
당신이 공격력 1 이하인 생물 한 개 이상으로 플레이어 또는 플레인즈워커를 공격할 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.name: Rigo, Mentor de Malandragem
foreignData.text:
Rigo, Mentor de Malandragem, entra no campo de batalha com um marcador de escudo. (Se ele sofreria dano ou seria destruído, em vez disso, remova um marcador de escudo dele.)
Toda vez que você atacar um jogador ou planeswalker com uma ou mais criaturas com poder igual ou inferior a 1, compre um card.

foreignData.name: Риго, Уличный Наставник
foreignData.text:

Каждый раз, когда вы атакуете игрока или planeswalker'а одним или несколькими существами с силой не более 1, возьмите карту.

foreignData.name: 街头明师瑞格
foreignData.text:

每当你以一个或数个力量等于或小于1的生物攻击一位牌手或鹏洛客时，抓一张牌。

foreignData.name: 街頭明師瑞格
foreignData.text:
街頭明師瑞格進戰場時上面有一個後盾指示物。（如果它將受到傷害或將被消滅，則改為從其上移去一個後盾指示物。）
每當你以一個或數個力量等於或小於1的生物攻擊一位玩家或鵬洛客時，抽一張牌。

cards.name: Rigo, Streetwise Mentor
cards.originalText:
Rigo, Streetwise Mentor enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
Whenever you attack a player or planeswalker with one or more creatures with power 1 or less, draw a card.

rulings.text: Shield counters don't prevent players from sacrificing creatures.
Removing a shield counter in this way isn't the same as regenerating a creature.
If a permanent that would be dealt damage has more than one shield counter on it, that damage is prevented and only one shield counter is removed.
If a permanent with a shield counter is dealt unpreventable damage, that damage will be dealt and a shield counter will still be removed.

A creature with a shield counter on it may still be destroyed by state-based actions if it has damage marked on it equal to its toughness or has been dealt unpreventable damage by a source with deathtouch.

“Shield” is not an ability that creatures have and shield counters are not keyword counters. If a creature with a shield counter loses its abilities, the shield counter will still protect it as normal.

cards.text:
Rigo, Streetwise Mentor enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
Whenever you attack a player or planeswalker with one or more creatures with power 1 or less, draw a card.

foreignData.flavorText: 「从门面到核心，我们就是**这座城市。」
foreignData.name: 勤工联霸权
foreignData.text: 每当你牺牲一个生物时，你可以将目标法术力值小于它的生物牌从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。每回合只能如此作一次。

foreignData.flavorText: 「從門面到核心，我們*就是*這座城市。」
foreignData.name: 勤工聯霸權
foreignData.text: 每當你犧牲一個生物時，你可以將目標魔法力值小於它的生物牌從你的墳墓場橫置移回戰場。每回合只能如此作一次。

cards.name: Riveteers Ascendancy
cards.originalText: Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you may return target creature card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Do this only once each turn.

rulings.text: “Do this only once each turn” refers only to the ability it is attached to, not other instances of the same ability. In other words, if you control multiple copies of Riveteers Ascendancy, you will be able to do this once for each of them.
Once you have chosen to return a creature to the battlefield, further instances of sacrificing creatures the same turn will not cause the ability to trigger.

If multiple instances of the ability are on the stack, you will be able to return a creature to the battlefield for only one of those instances. Once you do that, other instances will do nothing as they resolve.

“Do this only once each turn” refers to returning a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield using the triggered ability. As long as you haven't yet chosen to do that this turn, all instances of sacrificing a creature will cause Riveteers Ascendancy's ability to trigger.

cards.text: Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you may return target creature card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Do this only once each turn.

cards.name: Riveteers Charm
cards.originalText:
Choose one —
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker they control with the highest mana value among creatures and planeswalkers they control.
• Exile the top three cards of your library. Until your next end step, you may play those cards.
• Exile target player's graveyard.

rulings.text: For Riveteers Charm's first mode, if the target opponent controls more than one creature or planeswalker with the highest mana value among creatures and planeswalkers they control, that player chooses which one to sacrifice as Riveteers Charm resolves.

For the second mode, you must pay all costs and follow all normal timing rules for cards played this way. For example, you may play lands this way only during your main phase while no spells or abilities are on the stack and only if you haven't played a land yet this turn.

foreignData.name: Heimtückischer Hehler
foreignData.text:
Sowie der Heimtückische Hehler ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine bleibende Karte, die kein Land ist, bestimmen.
Aktivierte Fähigkeiten der bestimmten bleibenden Karte können nicht aktiviert werden.
Der Heimtückische Hehler hat alle aktivierten Fähigkeiten der bestimmten bleibenden Karte außer Loyalitätsfähigkeiten. Du kannst Mana ausgeben, als wäre es Mana einer beliebigen Farbe, um die Fähigkeiten zu aktivieren.

foreignData.name: Perista taimado
foreignData.text:
En cuanto el Perista taimado entre al campo de batalla, puedes elegir un permanente que no sea tierra.
Las habilidades activadas del permanente elegido no pueden activarse.
El Perista taimado tiene todas las habilidades activadas del permanente elegido excepto las habilidades de lealtad. Puedes usar maná como si fuera maná de cualquier color para activar esas habilidades.

foreignData.name: Receleur intrigant
foreignData.text:
Au moment où le Receleur intrigant arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez choisir un permanent non-terrain.
Les capacités activées du permanent choisi ne peuvent pas être activées.
Le Receleur intrigant a toutes les capacités activées du permanent choisi, excepté les capacités de loyauté. Vous pouvez dépenser du mana comme si c'était du mana de n'importe quelle couleur pour activer ces capacités.

foreignData.name: Ricettatore Cospiratore
foreignData.text:
Mentre il Ricettatore Cospiratore entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi scegliere un permanente non terra.
Le abilità attivate del permanente scelto non possono essere attivate.
Il Ricettatore Cospiratore ha tutte le abilità attivate del permanente scelto tranne le abilità di fedeltà. Puoi spendere il mana come se fosse mana di qualsiasi colore per attivare quelle abilità.

foreignData.name: 策謀の故買人
foreignData.text:
策謀の故買人が戦場に出るに際し、あなたは土地でないパーマネント１つを選んでもよい。
その選ばれたパーマネントの起動型能力は起動できない。
策謀の故買人はその選ばれたパーマネントが持ち忠誠度能力でないすべての起動型能力を持つ。あなたはそれらの能力を起動するためにマナを望む色のマナであるかのように支払ってもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・市民

foreignData.name: 음모를 꾸미는 장물아비
foreignData.text:
음모를 꾸미는 장물아비가 전장에 들어오면서, 당신은 대지가 아닌 지속물을 선택할 수 있다.
선택된 지속물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.
음모를 꾸미는 장물아비는 선택된 지속물의 충성 능력을 제외한 모든 활성화능력을 가진다. 당신은 마나를 원하는 색의 마나인 것처럼 지불하여 그 능력들을 활성화할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Receptador Ardiloso
foreignData.text:
Conforme Receptador Ardiloso entra no campo de batalha, você pode escolher uma permanente não de terreno.
As habilidades ativadas da permanente escolhida não podem ser ativadas.
Receptador Ardiloso tem todas as habilidades ativadas da permanente escolhida, exceto habilidades de lealdade. Você pode gastar mana como se fosse de qualquer cor para ativar aquelas habilidades.

foreignData.name: Интриган-Укрыватель
foreignData.text:
При выходе Интригана-Укрывателя на поле битвы вы можете выбрать не являющийся землей перманент.
Активируемые способности выбранного перманента не могут быть активированы.
Интриган-Укрыватель имеет все активируемые способности выбранного перманента, кроме способностей верности. Вы можете тратить ману на активацию тех способностей, как будто это мана любого цвета.

foreignData.name: 阴谋故买人
foreignData.text:
于阴谋故买人进战场时，你可以选择一个非地永久物。
所选永久物的起动式异能都不能起动。
阴谋故买人具有所选永久物的所有起动式异能，但忠诚异能除外。你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付起动这些异能的费用。

foreignData.name: 陰謀故買人
foreignData.text:
於陰謀故買人進戰場時，你可以選擇一個非地永久物。
所選永久物的起動式異能都不能起動。
陰謀故買人具有所選永久物的所有起動式異能，但忠誠異能除外。你可以將魔法力視同任意顏色的魔法力來支付起動這些異能的費用。

cards.name: Scheming Fence
cards.originalText:
As Scheming Fence enters the battlefield, you may choose a nonland permanent.
Activated abilities of the chosen permanent can't be activated.
Scheming Fence has all activated abilities of the chosen permanent except for loyalty abilities. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to activate those abilities.

rulings.text: Scheming Fence gains only activated abilities. It doesn't gain keyword abilities (unless those keyword abilities are activated), triggered abilities, or static abilities.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

Some activated abilities won't do anything when activated by Scheming Fence. For example, if the chosen permanent is an Equipment with an equip ability, activating that equip ability will not cause Scheming Fence to become attached because it isn't one of the subtypes which can be attached to permanents (Aura, Equipment, and Fortification).
If an ability that Scheming Fence gains refers to the permanent it is on by name, the ability Scheming Fence has refers to Scheming Fence instead.

cards.name: Snooping Newsie
cards.originalText:
When Snooping Newsie enters the battlefield, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)
As long as there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, Snooping Newsie gets +1/+1 and has lifelink.

rulings.text: If you have five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard and then some of them are removed such that you have fewer than five mana values among those cards, Snooping Newsie loses its bonus to power and toughness immediately. Notably, this may cause it to die if it now has damage marked on it greater than its toughness.
“Five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard” means there are at least five different mana values among those cards.
The mana value of a split card in the graveyard is the total mana value of both halves of that card. It does not have two mana values.
The mana value of a double-faced card in your graveyard is always the mana value of the front face.
X is 0 when determining the mana value of a card in your graveyard.
The mana value of a land card is 0.

cards.name: Soul of Emancipation
cards.originalText: When Soul of Emancipation enters the battlefield, destroy up to three other target nonland permanents. For each of those permanents, its controller creates a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying.

rulings.text: If a permanent is no longer a legal target as Soul of Emancipation's triggered ability resolves, that target's controller will not create an Angel for that permanent.

If a permanent is still a legal target as Soul of Emancipation's triggered ability resolves but it isn't destroyed, perhaps because it had a shield counter, its controller will create an Angel token for that permanent.

cards.name: Tainted Indulgence
cards.originalText: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: “Five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard” means there are at least five different mana values among those cards.
The mana value of a split card in the graveyard is the total mana value of both halves of that card. It does not have two mana values.
The mana value of a double-faced card in your graveyard is always the mana value of the front face.
X is 0 when determining the mana value of a card in your graveyard.
The mana value of a land card is 0.

cards.text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: Toluz, Clever Conductor
cards.originalText:
When Toluz, Clever Conductor enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Whenever you discard one or more cards, exile them from your graveyard.
When Toluz dies, put the cards exiled with it into their owner's hand.

rulings.text: Once an ability that causes a creature to connive begins to resolve, no player may take any other actions until it's done. Notably, opponents can't try to remove the conniving creature after you discard a nonland card but before it receives a counter.
If no card is discarded, most likely because that player's hand is empty and an effect says they can't draw cards, the conniving creature does not receive a +1/+1 counter.

If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to connive but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still connives. If you discard a nonland card this way, you won't put a +1/+1 counter on anything. Abilities that trigger “when [that creature] connives” will trigger.

foreignData.name: 불지옥 해방

cards.name: Unleash the Inferno
cards.originalText: Unleash the Inferno deals 7 damage to target creature or planeswalker. When it deals excess damage this way, destroy target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls with mana value less than or equal to that amount of excess damage.

rulings.text: Excess damage has been dealt to a creature if the damage dealt to it is greater than lethal damage. Usually, this means damage greater than its toughness, although damage already marked on the creature is taken into account.
Excess damage has been dealt to a planeswalker if the amount of damage dealt to it is greater than the number of loyalty counters that it had remaining when the damage was dealt.
A permanent cannot be dealt 0 excess damage.

cards.name: Ziatora's Envoy

rulings.text: “If you don't” in the second ability refers to whether you played a land or cast a spell from the top of your library, not just whether or not you cast a spell.

If you choose to pay the blitz cost rather than the mana cost, you're still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its blitz cost only if you could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the blitz cost to cast a creature spell, that permanent will be sacrificed only if it's still on the battlefield when that triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don't have to attack with the creature with blitz unless another ability says you do.

If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose blitz cost was paid, the copy won't have haste, won't be sacrificed, and its controller won't draw a card when it dies.
The triggered ability that lets its controller draw a card triggers when it dies for any reason, not just when you sacrifice it during the end step.

rulings.text: “Equip planeswalker” is a variant of the equip ability. “Equip planeswalker [cost]” means “[Cost]: Attach this permanent to target planeswalker you control as though that planeswalker were a creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”

foreignData.text: Quand la Planque des Courtiers arrive sur le champ de bataille, sacrifiez-la. Quand vous faites ainsi, cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de forêt, de plaine ou d'île de base, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée, puis mélangez et vous gagnez 1 point de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Una volta che il testimone fu dentro, il rifugio svanì prima alla vista, poi dalla memoria.
foreignData.name: Covo degli Intermediari
foreignData.text: Quando il Covo degli Intermediari entra nel campo di battaglia, sacrificalo. Quando lo fai, passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Foresta, Pianura o Isola base, mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescola e guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 目撃者が中に入ると、その隠れ家はまず視界から消え、その後記憶からも消えた。
foreignData.name: 斡旋屋一家の潜伏先
foreignData.text: 斡旋屋一家の潜伏先が戦場に出たとき、これを生け贄に捧げる。そうしたとき、あなたのライブラリーから基本であり森や平地や島であるカード１枚を探し、タップ状態で戦場に出す。その後、ライブラリーを切り直し、あなたは１点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 목격자가 안으로 들어가자, 은신처가 우선은 시야에서 사라졌고, 그 다음에는 기억에서 사라졌다.
foreignData.name: 브로커즈 은신처
foreignData.text: 브로커즈 은신처가 전장에 들어올 때, 브로커즈 은신처를 희생한다. 그렇게 할 때, 당신의 서고에서 기본 숲, 들 또는 섬 카드 한 장을 찾아, 그 카드를 탭된 채로 전장에 놓은 후, 서고를 섞고 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Assim que a testemunha entrou, o refúgio sumiu, primeiro de vista e depois da memória.
foreignData.name: Esconderijo dos Mediadores
foreignData.text: Quando Esconderijo dos Mediadores entrar no campo de batalha, sacrifique-o. Quando fizer isso, procure em seu grimório um card de Floresta, Planície ou Ilha básico, coloque-o no campo de batalha virado, depois embaralhe e você ganha 1 ponto de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Как только свидетель оказался внутри, укрытие исчезло сначала из виду, а потом из памяти.
foreignData.name: Укрытие Брокеров
foreignData.text: Когда Укрытие Брокеров выходит на поле битвы, пожертвуйте его. Когда вы это делаете, найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базового Леса, Равнины или Острова, положите ее на поле битвы повернутой, затем перетасуйте библиотеку, и вы получаете 1 жизнь.

foreignData.flavorText: 目击证人进门后，藏身处先从视线中消失，再自记忆中抹除。
foreignData.name: 扶济社藏所
foreignData.text: 当扶济社藏所进战场时，将它牺牲。当你如此作时，从你牌库中搜寻一张基本的树林，平原或海岛牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌且你获得1点生命。

foreignData.flavorText: 目擊證人進門後，藏身處先從視線中消失，再自記憶中抹除。

foreignData.text: 當扶濟社藏所進戰場時，將它犧牲。當你如此作時，從你牌庫中搜尋一張基本的樹林，平原或海島牌，將之橫置放進戰場，然後洗牌且你獲得1點生命。

cards.flavorText: Along the outer girders, in gold filigree, are inscribed the names of all those who fell to their deaths during construction.

foreignData.flavorText: An den äußeren Trägern sind in Goldfiligran die Namen all jener verewigt, die während des Baus in den Tod gestürzt sind.
foreignData.name: Spähposten der Umnieter
foreignData.text: Wenn der Spähposten der Umnieter ins Spiel kommt, opfere ihn. Wenn du dies tust, durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Sumpf-, Gebirge- oder Wald-Standardlandkarte, bringe sie getappt ins Spiel und mische danach. Du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: En las vigas exteriores están escritos en filigrana dorada los nombres de todos los que sufrieron una caída mortal durante la construcción.
foreignData.name: Mirador de los Remachadores
foreignData.text: Cuando el Mirador de los Remachadores entre al campo de batalla, sacrifícalo. Cuando lo hagas, busca en tu biblioteca una carta de Pantano, Montaña o Bosque básica y ponla en el campo de batalla girada. Luego baraja y ganas 1 vida.

foreignData.flavorText: Sur les poutres extérieures, on a inscrit en filigrane d'or les noms de tous ceux qui ont fait une chute mortelle durant la construction.
foreignData.name: Surplomb des Riveteurs
foreignData.text: Quand le Surplomb des Riveteurs arrive sur le champ de bataille, sacrifiez-le. Quand vous faites ainsi, cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de marais, de montagne ou de forêt de base, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée, puis mélangez et vous gagnez 1 point de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Lungo le travi perimetrali, in filigrana d'oro, sono incisi i nomi di tutti coloro che caddero durante la costruzione.
foreignData.name: Belvedere dei Rivettatori
foreignData.text: Quando il Belvedere dei Rivettatori entra nel campo di battaglia, sacrificalo. Quando lo fai, passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Palude, Montagna o Foresta base, mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescola e guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 橋桁の外側に沿って、建設中に転落死した全員の名前が金線細工で刻まれている。
foreignData.name: 土建組一家の監督所
foreignData.text: 土建組一家の監督所が戦場に出たとき、これを生け贄に捧げる。そうしたとき、あなたのライブラリーから基本であり沼や山や森であるカード１枚を探し、タップ状態で戦場に出す。その後、ライブラリーを切り直し、あなたは１点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText: 외곽에 늘어서 있는 대들보들에는 공사 중 추락사한 사람들 모두의 이름이 금박으로 새겨져 있다.
foreignData.name: 리베티어즈 전망대
foreignData.text: 리베티어즈 전망대가 전장에 들어올 때, 리베티어즈 전망대를 희생한다. 그렇게 할 때, 당신의 서고에서 기본 늪, 산 또는 숲 카드 한 장을 찾아, 그 카드를 탭된 채로 전장에 놓은 후, 서고를 섞고 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Nos parapeitos, em filigranas douradas, estão gravados os nomes de todos que caíram e morreram durante a construção.
foreignData.name: Mirante dos Rebiteiros
foreignData.text: Quando Mirante dos Rebiteiros entrar no campo de batalha, sacrifique-o. Quando fizer isso, procure em seu grimório um card de Pântano, Montanha ou Floresta básico, coloque-o no campo de batalha virado, depois embaralhe e você ganha 1 ponto de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: На внешних балках золотой филигранью начертаны имена всех тех, кто сорвался и погиб во время строительства.

foreignData.name: Elspeth die Strahlende
foreignData.text:
+1: Bestimme bis zu eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Lege eine +1/+1-Marke und eine Fliegend-, Erstschlag-, Lebensverknüpfung- oder Wachsamkeit-Marke auf sie (du entscheidest).
−3: Schaue dir die obersten sieben Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst davon eine bleibende Karte mit Manabetrag 3 oder weniger mit einer Schildmarke ins Spiel bringen. Lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.
−7: Erzeuge fünf 3/3 weiße Engel-Kreaturenspielsteine mit Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.name: Elspeth resplandeciente
foreignData.text:
+1: Elige hasta una criatura objetivo. Pon un contador +1/+1 y un contador de volar, dañar primero, vínculo vital o vigilancia sobre ella.
−3: Mira las siete primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner una carta de permanente con valor de maná de 3 o menos de entre ellas en el campo de batalla con un contador de escudo sobre ella. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en un orden aleatorio.
−7: Crea cinco fichas de criatura Ángel blancas 3/3 con la habilidad de volar.

cards.name: Elspeth Resplendent
cards.originalText:
+1: Choose up to one target creature. Put a +1/+1 counter and a counter from among flying, first strike, lifelink, or vigilance on it.
−3: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a permanent card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield with a shield counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
−7: Create five 3/3 white Angel creature tokens with flying.

rulings.text: For Elspeth's first ability, its controller chooses flying, first strike, lifelink, or vigilance, then that counter and the +1/+1 counter are placed on the target creature at the same time.
Shield counters don't prevent players from sacrificing creatures.
Removing a shield counter in this way isn't the same as regenerating a creature.
If a permanent that would be dealt damage has more than one shield counter on it, that damage is prevented and only one shield counter is removed.
If a permanent with a shield counter is dealt unpreventable damage, that damage will be dealt and a shield counter will still be removed.

A creature with a shield counter on it may still be destroyed by state-based actions if it has damage marked on it equal to its toughness or has been dealt unpreventable damage by a source with deathtouch.

“Shield” is not an ability that creatures have and shield counters are not keyword counters. If a creature with a shield counter loses its abilities, the shield counter will still protect it as normal.

cards.text:
[+1]: Choose up to one target creature. Put a +1/+1 counter and a counter from among flying, first strike, lifelink, or vigilance on it.
[−3]: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a permanent card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield with a shield counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
[−7]: Create five 3/3 white Angel creature tokens with flying.

cards.name: Ob Nixilis, the Adversary
cards.originalText:
Casualty X. The copy isn't legendary and has starting loyalty X. (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power X. When you do, copy this spell. The copy becomes a token.)
+1: Each opponent loses 2 life unless they discard a card. If you control a Demon or Devil, you gain 2 life.
−2: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
−7: Target player draws seven cards and loses 7 life.

rulings.text: As you cast a spell with casualty X, you choose whether to pay its casualty cost and what the value of X will be.

The copied spell from Ob Nixilis, the Adversary's triggered ability copies exactly what is printed on Ob Nixilis, except its starting loyalty is equal to the chosen value of X and it isn't legendary. The copy becomes a token as it resolves.
You can control exactly one legendary Ob Nixilis, the Adversary and any number of nonlegendary copies of Ob Nixilis, the Adversary.

Casualty N means “As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power N or greater.” and “When you cast this spell, if a casualty cost was paid for it, copy it. If the spell has any targets, you may choose new targets for the copy.”
You may sacrifice only one creature to pay a spell's casualty cost, and you copy the spell only once.
If you pay the casualty cost of a spell, the copy will resolve before the original spell.
The copy of the spell is created on the stack, so it's not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won't trigger.

cards.text:
Casualty X. The copy isn't legendary and has starting loyalty X. (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power X. When you do, copy this spell. The copy becomes a token.)
[+1]: Each opponent loses 2 life unless they discard a card. If you control a Demon or Devil, you gain 2 life.
[−2]: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
[−7]: Target player draws seven cards and loses 7 life.

cards.name: Halo Fountain
cards.originalText:
{W}, {T}, Untap a tapped creature you control: Create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
{W}{W}, {T}, Untap two tapped creatures you control: Draw a card.
{W}{W}{W}{W}{W}, {T}, Untap fifteen tapped creatures you control: You win the game.

rulings.text: Untapping creatures is part of the cost of all of Halo Fountain's abilities. Once you've begun activating an ability, other players can't take actions until you have finished activating it, including paying its costs. Notably, players can't take actions to remove the creatures from the battlefield to prevent you from untapping them to pay for the ability.

Activating mana abilities is done before paying costs when activating an ability. This means that if you control a creature which can be tapped for mana, such as Avacyn's Pilgrim, you may both tap it for mana and untap it to pay costs for Halo Fountain's activated abilities.

foreignData.name: Allsehender Schlichter

Fliegend

cards.name: All-Seeing Arbiter
cards.originalText:
Flying
Whenever All-Seeing Arbiter enters the battlefield or attacks, draw two cards, then discard a card.
Whenever you discard a card, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-0 until your next turn, where X is the number of different mana values among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: The mana value of a split card in the graveyard is the total mana value of both halves of that card. It does not have two mana values.
The mana value of a double-faced card in your graveyard is always the mana value of the front face.
X is 0 when determining the mana value of a card in your graveyard.
The mana value of a land card is 0.

cards.name: Titan of Industry
cards.originalText:
Reach, trample
When Titan of Industry enters the battlefield, choose two —
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Target player gains 5 life.
• Create a 4/4 green Rhino Warrior creature token.
• Put a shield counter on a creature you control.

rulings.text: Only the first and second modes of Titan of Industry's triggered ability have a target. If one of those modes is chosen with either the third or fourth mode and the only target is an illegal target when the ability would resolve, the ability does not resolve and the other chosen mode has no effect.
Shield counters don't prevent players from sacrificing creatures.
Removing a shield counter in this way isn't the same as regenerating a creature.
If a permanent that would be dealt damage has more than one shield counter on it, that damage is prevented and only one shield counter is removed.
If a permanent with a shield counter is dealt unpreventable damage, that damage will be dealt and a shield counter will still be removed.

A creature with a shield counter on it may still be destroyed by state-based actions if it has damage marked on it equal to its toughness or has been dealt unpreventable damage by a source with deathtouch.

“Shield” is not an ability that creatures have and shield counters are not keyword counters. If a creature with a shield counter loses its abilities, the shield counter will still protect it as normal.

foreignData.name: Topiari-Stampfer
foreignData.text:
Wachsamkeit
Wenn der Topiari-Stampfer ins Spiel kommt, durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte, bringe sie getappt ins Spiel und mische danach.
Der Topiari-Stampfer kann nicht angreifen oder blocken, es sei denn, du kontrollierst sieben oder mehr Länder.

foreignData.name: Aplastador arbustivo
foreignData.text:

Cuando el Aplastador arbustivo entre al campo de batalla, busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, ponla en el campo de batalla girada y luego baraja.
El Aplastador arbustivo no puede atacar ni bloquear a menos que controles siete o más tierras.

foreignData.name: Piétineur topiaire

Le Piétineur topiaire ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer à moins que vous ne contrôliez au moins sept terrains.

foreignData.name: Calpestatore Topiario

Il Calpestatore Topiario non può attaccare o bloccare a meno che tu non controlli sette o più terre.

あなたが７つ以上の土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、装飾庭園を踏み歩くものでは攻撃もブロックもできない。

장식 야수는 당신이 대지를 일곱 개 이상 조종하지 않는 한 공격 또는 방어할 수 없다.

Pisoteador de Topiaria não pode atacar nem bloquear, a menos que você controle sete ou mais terrenos.

foreignData.name: Engreído desvergonzado
foreignData.text:
Vigilancia.

foreignData.name: Parvenu intrépide

foreignData.name: Дерзкий Выскочка

cards.name: Brokers Charm
cards.originalText:

• Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

Bestimme eines —

• Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten +1/+1 und verursachen Trampelschaden bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.name: Amuleto de los Cabaretti

• Las criaturas que controlas obtienen +1/+1 y ganan la habilidad de arrollar hasta el final del turno.
• Crea dos fichas de criatura Ciudadano verdes y blancas 1/1.

foreignData.name: Charme des Cabaretti

foreignData.name: Talismano dei Cabaretti

foreignData.name: 舞台座一家の魔除け

• ターン終了時まで、あなたがコントロールしているすべてのクリーチャーは＋１/＋１の修整を受けトランプルを得る。

foreignData.name: 카바레티 부적

cards.name: Disciplined Duelist
cards.originalText:
Double strike
Disciplined Duelist enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it.

rulings.text: Shield counters don't prevent players from sacrificing creatures.
Removing a shield counter in this way isn't the same as regenerating a creature.
If a permanent that would be dealt damage has more than one shield counter on it, that damage is prevented and only one shield counter is removed.
If a permanent with a shield counter is dealt unpreventable damage, that damage will be dealt and a shield counter will still be removed.

A creature with a shield counter on it may still be destroyed by state-based actions if it has damage marked on it equal to its toughness or has been dealt unpreventable damage by a source with deathtouch.

“Shield” is not an ability that creatures have and shield counters are not keyword counters. If a creature with a shield counter loses its abilities, the shield counter will still protect it as normal.

cards.text:
Double strike
Disciplined Duelist enters the battlefield with a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

cards.name: Endless Detour
cards.originalText: The owner of target spell, nonland permanent, or card in a graveyard puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

rulings.text: If Endless Detour is targeting a spell and that spell is countered or otherwise goes to its owner's graveyard before Endless Detour resolves, it is no longer the same object and it will not be put on the top or bottom of its owner's library.
Endless Detour doesn't counter spells. A spell that can't be countered can still be put on the top or bottom of its owner's library this way.

Flash
À chaque fois qu'Evelyn, la cupide ou un autre vampire arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, exilez la carte du dessus de la bibliothèque de chaque joueur avec un marqueur « collection » sur elle.
Une fois par tour, vous pouvez jouer une carte depuis l'exil avec un marqueur « collection » sur elle si elle a été exilée par une capacité que vous contrôliez, et vous pouvez dépenser du mana comme si c'était du mana de n'importe quelle couleur pour la lancer.

foreignData.name: Evelyn, l'Avida
foreignData.text:
Lampo
Ogniqualvolta Evelyn, l'Avida o un altro Vampiro entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, esilia la prima carta del grimorio di ogni giocatore con un segnalino collezione su di essa.
Una volta per turno, puoi giocare una carta con un segnalino collezione dall'esilio se è stata esiliata da un'abilità che controllavi e puoi spendere mana come se fosse mana di qualsiasi colore per lanciarla.

foreignData.name: 欲深き者、エヴリン
foreignData.text:
瞬速
欲深き者、エヴリンやこれでない吸血鬼１体があなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、各プレイヤーのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード１枚を蒐集カウンター１個が置かれた状態で追放する。
毎ターン１回、あなたは、あなたがコントロールしていた能力によって追放されていて追放領域にあり蒐集カウンターが置かれているカード１枚をプレイしてもよく、あなたはそれを唱えるためにマナを望む色のマナであるかのように支払ってもよい。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 吸血鬼・ならず者

foreignData.name: 갈망하는 자, 에블린
foreignData.text:
섬광
갈망하는 자, 에블린 또는 다른 흡혈귀가 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 각 플레이어의 서고 맨 위 카드에 수집품 카운터 한 개를 올려놓고 추방한다.
한 턴에 한 번, 당신은 당신이 조종하는 능력으로 추방되었으며 수집품 카운터가 놓여 있는 카드 한 장을 플레이할 수 있고, 그 카드를 발동하기 위한 마나는 원하는 색의 마나인 것처럼 지불할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Evelyn, a Cobiçosa
foreignData.text:
Lampejo
Toda vez que Evelyn, a Cobiçosa, ou qualquer outro Vampiro entrar no campo de batalha sob seu controle, exile o card do topo do grimório de cada jogador com um marcador de coleção.
Uma vez a cada turno, você pode jogar um card com um marcador de coleção do exílio se ele tiver sido exilado por uma habilidade controlada por você, e pode gastar mana como se fosse de qualquer cor para conjurá-lo.

foreignData.name: Эвелин, Алчная
foreignData.text:
Миг
Каждый раз, когда Эвелин, Алчная или другой Вампир выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, изгоните верхнюю карту библиотеки каждого из игроков с жетоном коллекции на ней.
Один раз в каждом ходу вы можете разыграть из изгнания карту с жетоном коллекции на ней, если она была изгнана способностью под вашим контролем, и вы можете тратить ману на ее разыгрывание, как будто это мана любого цвета.

foreignData.name: 贪婪的艾弗琳
foreignData.text:
闪现
每当贪婪的艾弗琳或另一个吸血鬼在你的操控下进战场时，放逐每位牌手的牌库顶牌，且其上有一个收藏指示物。
限每回合一次，如果放逐区中某张其上有收藏指示物的牌是以由你操控的异能放逐，则你便可以从放逐区中使用之，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放它的费用。

限每回合一次，如果放逐區中某張其上有收藏指示物的牌是以由你操控的異能放逐，則你便可以從放逐區中使用之，且你可以將魔法力視同任意顏色的魔法力來支付施放它的費用。

cards.name: Evelyn, the Covetous

Whenever Evelyn, the Covetous or another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, exile the top card of each player's library with a collection counter on it.
