[−2]: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
[−7]: Target player draws seven cards and loses 7 life.

cards.name: Scheming Fence

rulings.text: Scheming Fence gains only activated abilities. It doesn't gain keyword abilities (unless those keyword abilities are activated), triggered abilities, or static abilities.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

Some activated abilities won't do anything when activated by Scheming Fence. For example, if the chosen permanent is an Equipment with an equip ability, activating that equip ability will not cause Scheming Fence to become attached because it isn't one of the subtypes which can be attached to permanents (Aura, Equipment, and Fortification).
If an ability that Scheming Fence gains refers to the permanent it is on by name, the ability Scheming Fence has refers to Scheming Fence instead.

cards.text:
As Scheming Fence enters the battlefield, you may choose a nonland permanent.
Activated abilities of the chosen permanent can't be activated.
Scheming Fence has all activated abilities of the chosen permanent except for loyalty abilities. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to activate those abilities.

cards.name: Jaxis, the Troublemaker
cards.originalText:
{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of another target creature you control. It gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.
Blitz {1}{R}

rulings.text: The token copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing else (unless it's copying a creature that's a token or that's copying something else; see below). It doesn't copy whether the creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and/or Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that changed its power, toughness, types, color, and so on. Most notably, if the target creature isn't normally a creature, the copy won't be a creature.
If the copied creature has {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.
If a copied creature is copying something else, the token you create will use the copiable values of the target creature. In most cases, it will just be a copy of whatever that creature is copying.
If a copied creature is a token that isn't a copy of something else, the copy copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that created it.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any “as [this permanent] enters the battlefield” or “[this permanent] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the copied creature card will also work.

If another creature becomes a copy of, or enters the battlefield as a copy of, the token, that creature will copy the creature card the token is copying. However, it won't have either haste or “When this creature dies, draw a card,” and you won't sacrifice the new copy at the beginning of the next end step.

If Jaxis, the Troublemaker's ability creates multiple tokens due to a replacement effect (such as the one Doubling Season creates), you'll sacrifice each of them at the beginning of the next end step.

If you choose to pay the blitz cost rather than the mana cost, you're still casting the spell. It goes on the stack and can be responded to and countered. You can cast a creature spell for its blitz cost only if you could cast that creature spell. Most of the time, this means during your main phase when the stack is empty.

If you pay the blitz cost to cast a creature spell, that permanent will be sacrificed only if it's still on the battlefield when that triggered ability resolves. If it dies or goes to another zone before then, it will stay where it is.
You don't have to attack with the creature with blitz unless another ability says you do.

If a creature enters the battlefield as a copy of or becomes a copy of a creature whose blitz cost was paid, the copy won't have haste, won't be sacrificed, and its controller won't draw a card when it dies.
The triggered ability that lets its controller draw a card triggers when it dies for any reason, not just when you sacrifice it during the end step.

foreignData.name: Rassembleuse de rumeurs
foreignData.text: Alliance — À chaque fois qu'une autre créature arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, regard 1. Si c'est la deuxième fois que cette capacité s'est résolue ce tour-ci, piochez une carte à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: "Oh, le cose che i loro proprietari rivelano quando pensano che nessuno stia ascoltando."
foreignData.name: Collezionista di Dicerie
foreignData.text: Alleanza — Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, profetizza 1. Se è la seconda volta che si è risolta questa abilità in questo turno, invece pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「この子たちの飼い主が、まさか誰も聞いてないだろうと思っている時に喋っちゃう話がとても愉快だわ。」
foreignData.name: 噂の蒐集家
foreignData.text: 団結 ― これでないクリーチャー１体があなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、占術１を行う。このターンにこの能力が解決したのが２回目であるなら、代わりにカード１枚を引く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: "아무도 듣지 않는다고 생각할 때 사람들이 입 밖으로 내는 것들을 들어 보면 아주 즐겁지."
foreignData.name: 소문 수집가
foreignData.text: 연대 — 다른 생물이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 점술 1을 한다. 이번 능력이 이 턴에 두 번째로 해결되는 것이라면, 대신 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "É uma maravilha. As coisas que os donos revelam quando acham que não tem ninguém ouvindo..."
foreignData.name: Coletora de Rumores
foreignData.text: Aliança — Toda vez que outra criatura entrar no campo de batalha sob seu controle, use vidência 1. Se esta for a segunda vez que esta habilidade é resolvida neste turno, em vez disso, compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: «Удивительно, что могут рассказать другие, когда думают, что никто не слушает».
foreignData.name: Собирательница Слухов
foreignData.text: Альянс — Каждый раз, когда другое существо выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, предскажите 1. Если эта способность разрешилась в этом ходу во второй раз, вместо этого возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 「它们的主人毫无戒心地自言自语，里头透露的事情可真有意思。」

foreignData.text: 联手～每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，占卜1。如果这是此异能在本回合第二次的结算，则改为抓一张牌。

cards.flavorText: Elspeth wanted answers. Xander needed a spy. Their paths were destined to cross.

foreignData.flavorText: Elspeth wollte Antworten. Xander brauchte eine Spionin. Ihre Wege mussten sich einfach kreuzen.
foreignData.name: Nicht ablehnbares Angebot
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Sein Beherrscher erzeugt zwei Schatz-Spielsteine.

foreignData.flavorText: Elspeth quería respuestas. Xander necesitaba un espía. Sus caminos estaban predestinados a cruzarse.
foreignData.name: Una oferta que no podrás rechazar
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo que no sea de criatura. Su controlador crea dos fichas de Tesoro.

foreignData.flavorText: Elspeth voulait des réponses. Xander avait besoin d'un espion. Leurs chemins étaient appelés à se croiser.
foreignData.name: Une offre qui ne se refuse pas
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez un sort non-créature ciblé. Son contrôleur crée deux jetons Trésor.

foreignData.flavorText: Elspeth voleva delle risposte. Xander aveva bisogno di una spia. Le loro strade erano destinate a incrociarsi.
foreignData.name: Un'Offerta Che Non Si Può Rifiutare
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia non creatura bersaglio. Il suo controllore crea due pedine Tesoro.

foreignData.flavorText: エルズペスは答えを求めた。ザンダーはスパイが必要だった。二人の道は交差する運命にあった。
foreignData.name: 断れない提案
foreignData.text: クリーチャーでない呪文１つを対象とする。それを打ち消す。それのコントローラーは宝物・トークン２つを生成する。

foreignData.flavorText: 엘스페스는 답을 원했다. 잰더에게는 스파이가 필요했다. 둘의 길은 서로 교차할 운명이었다.
foreignData.name: 거절할 수 없는 제안
foreignData.text: 생물이 아닌 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다. 그 지속물의 조종자는 보물 토큰 두 개를 만든다.

foreignData.flavorText: Elspeth queria respostas. Xander precisava de uma espiã. Era destino que os caminhos deles se cruzassem.
foreignData.name: Oferta Irrecusável
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo não de criatura. Seu controlador cria duas fichas de Tesouro.

foreignData.flavorText: Элспет хотела получить ответы. Зандеру нужен был шпион. Им было предначертано встретиться.
foreignData.name: Предложение Без Права На Отказ
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание, не являющееся заклинанием существа. Контролирующий его игрок создает две фишки Клада.

foreignData.flavorText: 艾紫培想要答案。尚夺尔需要间谍。其命运注定交会。
foreignData.name: 无法拒绝的条件
foreignData.text: 反击目标非生物咒语。其操控者派出两个珍宝衍生物。

foreignData.flavorText: 艾紫培想要答案。尚奪爾需要間諜。其命運註定交會。

cards.name: An Offer You Can't Refuse
cards.originalText: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller creates two Treasure tokens.

rulings.text: If the target is no longer legal as An Offer You Can't Refuse resolves, no Treasure tokens are created.
If the target is still legal as it resolves but the spell can't be countered for some reason, its controller will still create two Treasure tokens.

cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller creates two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

cards.flavorText:

—Krandal, freelance instigator

foreignData.flavorText:

—Krandal, freiberuflicher Anstifter
foreignData.name: Beschuldigen
foreignData.text: Bestimme zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl, die derselbe Spieler kontrolliert. Der Spieler opfert eine davon.

—Krandal, instigador autónomo

foreignData.text: Elige dos criaturas objetivo controladas por el mismo jugador. Ese jugador sacrifica una de ellas.

foreignData.flavorText:

—Krandal, instigateur indépendant

foreignData.flavorText:

—Krandal, istigatore prezzolato
foreignData.name: Incriminare

foreignData.flavorText:
「もし私があなたなら、そのエルフの外套を調べるでしょうな。あなたが到着する直前に、彼がポケットに何かを忍ばせたのを見ましたから。」
――無所属の教唆者、クランドル
foreignData.name: なすりつけ
foreignData.text: 同じプレイヤーがコントロールしているクリーチャー２体を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはそれらのうち１体を生け贄に捧げる。

foreignData.flavorText:
"나라면, 저 엘프의 코트를 확인해 보겠어. 네가 도착하기 직전에 주머니에 뭔가를 집어넣는 걸 봤거든."
—프리랜서 선동가, 크란달

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.name: Incriminar
foreignData.text: Escolha duas criaturas alvo controladas pelo mesmo jogador. Aquele jogador sacrifica uma delas.

foreignData.flavorText:
«На твоем месте я бы проверил плащ того эльфа. Я видел, как он что-то сунул в карман прямо перед тем, как вы явились».
— Крэндал, наемный подстрекатель
foreignData.name: Возложить Вину

foreignData.flavorText:

cards.name: Light 'Em Up
cards.originalText:
Casualty 2
Light 'Em Up deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

rulings.text: Casualty N means “As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power N or greater.” and “When you cast this spell, if a casualty cost was paid for it, copy it. If the spell has any targets, you may choose new targets for the copy.”
You may sacrifice only one creature to pay a spell's casualty cost, and you copy the spell only once.
If you pay the casualty cost of a spell, the copy will resolve before the original spell.
The copy of the spell is created on the stack, so it's not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won't trigger.

cards.text:
Casualty 2 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
Light 'Em Up deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
